channel.title: New MM Converts! (Work in progress)
channel.description:
**before you read, Please note that I am not looking to get these implemented into the game, this is just for fun. i get that this would be Overpowered, but this is 100% for fun**
Firstly, there is now a convert for Prince, Alchemist, Fool, and the Neutral Killers (Sorcerer, Reaper, Possessor). But they will still be convert immune, (Accept fool) the MM will have a new day ability called "Bypass convert immunity" (x2) which does as it says, the king and the inquisitor will be the only ones 100% unconvertable.
Class: Kidnapper
Converts from: Prince
Abilities - Has the same ability set as prince, except can only execute every other night (1, 3, 5, 7) or (2, 4, 6, 8) and so on.
Class: Dominater
Converts from: Possessor
Abilites -
Day ability: Frame - Make a blue dragon or neutral player appear as unseen for a night
Night ability: Energy Transfer - Make one player target another (Can not make an unseen member target someone else)
Night ability: Harness Light - Make an unseen member appear as a different class, when they die they will show up as the selected class, and when an investigative class investigates them they will see what they would get for the class you selected, (Lasts for 3 days)
Class: Gatekeeper
Converts From: Reaper
Day ability: Paralyze - Makes the target incapable of speaking for the rest of the day
Day ability: Stalk - Make the target incapable of using their ability tonight
Night ability: Send To Abyss - Kill anyone visiting any of the members of the unseen (Max deaths per night is 3)
Will work on more later :slight_smile: Tell me if you like it so far!

item.dc:creator: techwolves
item.description:
Well i didnt say it was perfect i only said one way to nerf it

item.title: New MM Converts! (Work in progress)
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
That is to OP, personally I don’t think it will be fun tbh

Kidnapper is terrible for BD, so playing as BD wouldn’t be fun

Converting NK would also be awful imo

The only things I would like are alch and fool converted forms

Read full topic

item.title: New MM Converts! (Work in progress)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Kidnapper would be so OP. Extra kills.

Also converting the NK would also be OP for Unseen

Read full topic

item.title: New MM Converts! (Work in progress)
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Roles are Conversion Immune for a reason… sorry, but the concept here is just inherently flawed IMO.

Read full topic
